pages.title: Books of Binding
pages.text: Books of binding contain the summoning text specific to the spirit class. Once the name of the spirit to summon has been written into the book, the book is considered bound to that spirit and can be used to summon it.
To place a spirit name in the book, craft the book of binding with this dictionary. The books of binding themselves are crafted using $(item)Book and Quill$() and various dyes.
